name: Dream Rider
description:
Ride through your dreams to fly away from the stresses of life, but sometimes they still find you. Dodge obstacles and stay ahead of the looming alarm clock monster as it messes with time to stop you. 

This is my first game jam for Brackeys 2022.1  Game Jam, the prompt was "It is not real." I didn't have a ton of time for this jam, but I am super happy that I was able to make something playable, and learn a lot during the process. There was definitely more polish I could've done, but its 3am, and I'm tired. I'd appreciate thoughtful criticism.

All the assets were made by me, excluding a google font I used.
